text:
*Maven AGI is hiring Solutions Architects / Solutions Engineers to support pre and post Sale-GTM with getting customers live and enabled with GenAI for Customer Experience*
<https://www.linkedin.com/posts/eugenemann_hiring-activity-7296279659271385088-81fL/>
- You thrive when operating with a start-up, entrepreneurial mindset—solving problems on the fly.
- You’ve got a strong technical foundation and can speak the language of engineers.
- You’re eager to be on the front lines, collaborating directly with customers.
- AI isn’t just a buzzword to you—you’re genuinely passionate about it.

Email <mailto:eugene@mavenagi.com|eugene@mavenagi.com> or apply!
